title: Special Sparkle!
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Alright, alright. I got the finishing touches on it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Ara, Setsuna, what are you up to?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Lanzhu-san, great timing! I tried making two-layered jelly! I thought I made a nice, sweet snack for everyone since it’s been so hot lately.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Kyaah! Awesome! The red and green colors remind me of watermelons~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I used strawberry-flavored jelly for the red and melon-flavored jelly for the green. All you have to do is add hot water.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>I see. That’s amazing, Setsuna!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Heh heh, feel free to praise me more once you’ve tried it! I added a little of Setsuna’s Special Sparkle, my secret ingredient!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Setsuna’s Secret Sparkle......! I’m excited to try it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I’ll make sure to meet your expectations, Lanzhu-san♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0211/>Let’s get this to everyone, quick! Lanzhu is gonna eat tons~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
